recipesJson.name: Volcanic (Lava Flow Remix)
recipesJson.author: VaporDude
recipesJson.description: A delicious take on one of my favorite liquids a wonderful pairing of strawberry coconut and pineapple with some subtle additions to make the flavor pop.

reviews.text: Really liking this Raspberry switch-up, I think you are onto something here with coconut & raspberry! Thanks for posting this recipe!

Review from somebody who cant taste strawberry just to keep in mind.
 This is a very fresh, tropical and fruity mix. perfect for summer. Foreground is the fruit mix (here normal People will probably taste strawberry) and on the backend it gives a super nice tropical vibe with the pineapple + coconut combination. I really enjoyed this vape and the missing star is not because any lack of taste but my inability to rate this accurate due to not tasting strawberry.
I subbed TPA coconut for coconut extra and this still turned out excellent.  I got some coconut extra while this was waiting to be tasted, so I'll mix the legit version later on.
